This notebook attempts Lab 4 of dsbox: https://datasciencebox.org/course-materials/lab-instructions/lab-04/lab-04-viz-sp-data.html , with a goal of preparing for class.

### Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dsbox)
```

### Experiment of point process

Let's create fale data in an arbitrary, cartesian coordinate setting.


6 hotels of type Q:

```{r}
n=6 
dfq=tibble(type="Q",x=runif(n,0,2),y=runif(n,0,1))

```

20 restauratntes of type D:

```{r}
n=20 
dfd=tibble(type="D",x=runif(n,0,2),y=runif(n,0,1))
```

Compute a full cross-join:

```{r}
df_x=full_join(dfq,dfd,by=as.character())
```

And also a contatenated data frame:

```{r}
dfc=bind_rows(dfq,dfd)
```

```{r}
dfc %>% ggplot(aes(x,y,color=type))+geom_point()
```
